description: Even having worked as a tour guide and going to the Grand Canyon probably more than 30 times, it's amazing every time!
Anytime I cook in the kitchen my dog Thylo has to come in and see what is up. I think she knows I'm more likely to drop food than my wife.
Just my cat Chirps being lazy.
I love Japan! I've gotten to go a few times. This is a temple in Kyoto, that is very famous, called Kinkakuji.
My wife and I took a jaunting car tour in Kilarney, Ireland. Our guide was so funny! Had all sorts of jokes, and knew a ton about the history. Well worth it.
Completely unintentionally ran into my idol while at Disneyland!
A fun snowy day at the zoo, the bears were out and playing with each other.
If I remember correctly, this is an Arabian Sand Cat. Looks exactly like a house cat to me though!
I must have taken 100 pictures trying to get a good picture of the river otters. But this was the best I could do with my skill level...
No matter what size the cat is, they love a big stretch!
Tigers have to be the most beautiful animals. And terrifying. But also cute when they stick their tongues out!
